transform","artifact":{"name":"wrangler-transform","version":"4.9.1-SNAPSHOT","scope":"SYSTEM"},"properties":{"field":"*","precondition":"STATU == "B" &&  (MENGE == null || MENGE  == '' || BSMNG == null || BSMNG == '' || (MENGE-BSMNG)<0 || (MENGE-BSMNG)==0)","directives":"set-column Line format("%6.0f",BNFPO).replace(" ","0")

set-column OrderId BANFN

set-column OrderSiteValue WERKS

set-column OrderTypeValue 'NB_PR'

set-column OrderSupplierId (LIFNR !~ null && LIFNR !~ '' ? LIFNR : (FLIEF !~ null && FLIEF !~ '' ? FLIEF : (RESWK !~ null && RESWK !~ '' ? RESWK : 'No_Supplier')))

set-column PartName MATNR

set-column PartSiteValue WERKS

set-column StartDate null

set-column DockDate (LFDAT !~ null ? LFDAT : ${FutureDate} )

set-column DockToStockLeadTime WEBAZ

set-column DueDate ""

set-column TotalQuantity MENGE

set-column Quantity ( MENGE > BSMNG ? (MENGE-BSMNG) : 0)

set-column StatusValue (FIXKZ == null || FIXKZ=='' ? "O" :"F")

set-column ShipmentSupplierId "No_Supplier"

set-column FixedLeadTime PLIFZ

set-column VarLeadTime 0

set-column PreShipLT 0

set-column OriginalDueDate (LFDAT !~ null ? LFDAT : ${FutureDate} )

set-column TransactionSequence 0

set-column TransitTime 0

set-column UnconstrainedQuantity 0

set-column UnitPrice PREIS

set-type DockToStockLeadTime decimal
set-column DockToStockLeadTime DockToStockLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type TotalQuantity decimal
set-column TotalQuantity TotalQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type Quantity decimal
set-column Quantity Quantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type FixedLeadTime decimal
set-column FixedLeadTime FixedLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type VarLeadTime decimal
set-column VarLeadTime VarLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type PreShipLT decimal
set-column PreShipLT PreShipLT.setScale(4,4)

set-type TransitTime decimal
set-column TransitTime TransitTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type UnconstrainedQuantity decimal
set-column UnconstrainedQuantity UnconstrainedQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type UnitPrice decimal
set-column UnitPrice UnitPrice.setScale(4,4)","on-error":"fail-pipeline","schema":"{"name":"etlSchemaBody","type":"record","fields":[{"name":"Line","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderId","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderSiteValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderTypeValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"OrderSupplierId","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"PartName","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"PartSiteValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"StartDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"DockDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"DockToStockLeadTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"DueDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"TotalQuantity","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"Quantity","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"StatusValue","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"ShipmentSupplierId","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"FixedLeadTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"VarLeadTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"PreShipLT","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"OriginalDueDate","type":["string","null"]},{"name":"TransactionSequence","type":["int","null"]},{"name":"TransitTime","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"UnconstrainedQuantity","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]},{"name":"UnitPrice","type":[{"type":"bytes","logicalType":"decimal","precision":32,"scale":4},"null"]}]}"}},"information":{"comments":{"list":[{"content":"--------------
Rename BNFPO to ItemNumber
---------------

set-column ItemNumber BNFPO

----------
Rename Order_WERKSPlant and add default values for OrderType
----------

set-column Order_WERKSPlant WERKS
set-column OrderType 'NB_PR'

----------
SupplierId and Part_WERKSPlant
----------

set-column SupplierId (LIFNR !~ NULL && LIFNR !~ '' ? LIFNR : (FLIEF !~ NULL && FLIEF !~ '' ? FLIEF : (RESWK !~ NULL && RESWK !~ '' ? RESWK : 'No_Supplier')))

set-column PartName MATNR
set-column Part_WERKSPlant WERKS

----------
StartDate, DockDate and DueDate
----------

set-column StartDate NULL
set-column DockDate (LFDAT !~ NULL ? LFDAT : ${FutureDate} )
set-column DueDate (LFDAT !~ NULL ? LFDAT : ${FutureDate} )

----------
Rename WEBAZ to DockToStockLeadTime
----------

set-column DockToStockLeadTime WEBAZ

----------
TotalQuantity and Quantity
----------

set-column TotalQuantity MENGE
set-column Quantity ( MENGE > BSMNG ? (MENGE-BSMNG) : 0)
 
----------
Derive  Status based on FIXKZ
----------

set-column Status (FIXKZ == NULL || FIXKZ=='' ? "O" :"F")

----------
Add default value for ShipmentSupplierId
----------

set-column ShipmentSupplierId "No_Supplier"

----------
LeadTime Columns
----------

set-column FixedLeadTime PLIFZ
set-column VarLeadTime 0
set-column PreShipLeadTime 0

----------
OriginalDueDate
----------

set-column OriginalDueDate (LFDAT !~ NULL ? LFDAT : ${FutureDate} )

----------
Set default values for TransactionSequence,TransitTime and UnconstrainedQuantity
----------

set-column TransactionSequence 0
set-column TransitTime 0
set-column UnconstrainedQuantity 0

----------
Rename Unit Price and Reservation
----------

set-column UnitPrice PREIS


---
convert to decimal
----
set-type ItemNumber decimal
set-column ItemNumber ItemNumber.setScale(4,4)

set-type DockToStockLeadTime decimal
set-column DockToStockLeadTime DockToStockLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type TotalQuantity decimal
set-column TotalQuantity TotalQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type Quantity decimal
set-column Quantity Quantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type FixedLeadTime decimal
set-column FixedLeadTime FixedLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type VariableLeadTime decimal
set-column VariableLeadTime VariableLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type PreShipLeadTime decimal
set-column PreShipLeadTime PreShipLeadTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type TransitTime decimal
set-column TransitTime TransitTime.setScale(4,4)

set-type UnconstrainedQuantity decimal
set-column UnconstrainedQuantity UnconstrainedQuantity.setScale(4,4)

set-type UnitPrice decimal
set-column UnitPrice UnitPrice.setScale(4,4)
